items.sentence: I know that Tom would be upset if I did that.
I know that Tom would be mad if you did that.
I know that Tom would be hesitant to do that.
I know that Tom won't tell Mary who did that.
I know that Tom won't show us how to do that.
I know that Tom won't permit Mary to do that.
I know that Tom won't be prepared to do that.
I know that Tom will want to do that with us.
I know that Tom will teach me how to do that.
I know that Tom will be fired for doing that.
I know that Tom will be fined for doing that.
I know that Tom will be doing that with Mary.
I know that Tom will be doing that on Monday.
I know that Tom will be desperate to do that.
Maybe Tom doesn't know I hardly ever do that.
Maybe Tom doesn't know I don't often do that.
It was clear that Tom was tempted to do that.
It was clear Tom wouldn't do that by himself.
It was clear Tom would be allowed to do that.
It was clear Tom would allow Mary to do that.
